name: notes-app-back-end
description: A RESTful API back-end application built with Node.js, Hapi, and Bun, providing a simple note-taking service.

scripts.build:local: npm install && bun run copy-env && bun run generate-token && bun run migrate up && bun run start:dev
scripts.build:server: npm install && bun run copy-env && bun run generate-token && echo HOST=0.0.0.0 > .env.production && bun run migrate up && sudo npm i -g pm2 && pm2 start bun --name "notes-app-back-end" -- run start:prod
scripts.build:docker: docker build -t farismnrr/notes-app:2.0-postgres . && bun run start:docker
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src --ext js --exec "bun run src/server.js"
scripts.start:docker: bun run migrate up && docker run -d -p 5000:5000 --name notes-app farismnrr/notes-app:2.0-postgres

author: farismnrr
